name: US Aviation Academy - Schreiner University
about:
US Aviation Academy and Schreiner University's aviation programs offer comprehensive flight training and academic excellence. At US Aviation Academy, located in Texas, students can pursue certifications such as Private Pilot, Commercial Pilot, Flight Instructor, Instrument Rating, and Multi Engine Ratings. The academy boasts a broad aircraft selection and a history dating back to 2006, starting with three airplanes and a small team at Denton Municipal Airport.

Schreiner University's Aviation Program, launched in 2024, provides a bachelor's degree in Aviation Studies, incorporating FAA Private and Commercial pilot certificates with an instrument rating. The program is based at Kerrville Airport and is committed to offering top-tier training, preparing students for high-paying careers in aviation. With state-of-the-art facilities and dedicated faculty, both programs ensure students receive the best possible education to pursue their dreams in aviation.
